title: Copper Stocks, Europe and Afloat, End of the Month for United Kingdom
notes:
The First Time These Statistics Were Published Was In December Of 1881. Previous Data Are December 1880: 60,610 And; And June 1881: 59,936. The Data Represent Stocks Of Standard Copper In England, Le Havre, Rotterdam, Hamburg And Bremen, Plus An Amount Not Specified Which May Be Stocks Afloat. Rotterdam, Hamburg And Bremen Stocks Are Taken As Of July 31, 1914 (Rotterdam = 1.150; Hamburg = 2.867; Bremen = 1.106). Source: The Economist, Supplement Of April 14, 1883, P. 11 Dun'S Metal Handbook And Statistics

This NBER data series m05022 appears on the NBER website in Chapter 5 at http://www.nber.org/databases/macrohistory/contents/chapter05.html.

NBER Indicator: m05022
